FROM ubuntu:trusty
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -yq curl && apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

WORKDIR /app

ADD test.sh /app/test.sh

CMD ["bash", "test.sh"]
